kbd_mapDefine a keyword map
Keyboard MapsA keyboard map is defined as a table for the scancodes of the keyboard.

Keyboard Maps

A keyboard map is defined as a table for the scancodes of the keyboard.  Each scancode has associated 4 characters:

char, CAPS+char, SHIFT+char, CAPS+SHIFT+char

If a scancode must not be translated to a char, use 0 %define KEYMAP keymap
